Posts.HTML:
I'm officially announcing that I'm working on a new text game:

"Kurri Ming"

It's a lot shorter then anything I've ever created, a simple "Get out of the house" game. Special thanks to "Tomsa" for giving me the idea of creating a party system. I've set it up a little differently then in "Escape the Prison" though. In my game you'll be able to switch between characters by clicking on the dropdown menu found in the toolbar at the top (where it says: Quest, Debug, Help). Pending on my schedule, I should have it uploaded by the end of the month. Hope everyone enjoys playing it when I do.
